content.rendered:
Evelina Karlsson is a member of Mannheimer Swartling’s Dispute Resolution and Restructuring and Insolvency practice groups.

Evelina works with all types of commercial disputes, and she has acted as counsel under several arbitral institutions (including the rules of the SCC and the ICC), both in Sweden and abroad. She has broad experience of disputes in various fields, such as insurance, licensing, cooperation agreements and in a number of different industries such as energy, telecom and transportation. Evelina also has experience representing clients before Swedish courts and representing clients’ interests in bankruptcies and corporate reorganisations.
